name: Scions & Spellcraft Collector's Edition (Final Fantasy Commander Precon Decklist)
description: Source: https://magic.wizards.com/en/news/announcements/final-fantasy-commander-decklists WARNING: In French, German, Italian, Spanish, and some English printings of the Scions & Spellcraft and Scions & Spellcraft Collector's Edition Commander decks, the card Sage's Nouliths was replaced with the card Sahagin.

main.name: Y'shtola, Night's Blessed
main.oracle_text:
Vigilance
At the beginning of each end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, you draw a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or greater, Y'shtola deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Hildibrand Manderville // Gentleman's Rise
card.type_line: Legendary Creature — Human Detective // Instant — Adventure

card_faces.name: Hildibrand Manderville
card_faces.oracle_text:
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
When Hildibrand Manderville dies, you may cast it from your graveyard as an Adventure until the end of your next turn.

card_faces.name: Gentleman's Rise
card_faces.oracle_text: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: Hildibrand Manderville // Gentleman's Rise
card.type_line: Legendary Creature — Human Detective // Instant — Adventure

card_faces.name: Hildibrand Manderville
card_faces.oracle_text:
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
When Hildibrand Manderville dies, you may cast it from your graveyard as an Adventure until the end of your next turn.

card_faces.name: Gentleman's Rise
card_faces.oracle_text: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card_faces.name: Mesmeric Glare
card_faces.oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 3 or less. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card_faces.name: Mesmeric Glare
card_faces.oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 3 or less. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card_faces.name: Murderous Rider
card_faces.oracle_text:
Lifelink
When this creature dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.

card_faces.name: Swift End
card_faces.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You lose 2 life. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card_faces.name: Murderous Rider
card_faces.oracle_text:
Lifelink
When this creature dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.

card_faces.name: Swift End
card_faces.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You lose 2 life. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

card.name: G'raha Tia, Scion Reborn
card.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Throw Wide the Gates — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay X life, where X is that spell's mana value. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Hero creature token and put X +1/+1 counters on it. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Emet-Selch of the Third Seat
card.oracle_text:
Spells you cast from your graveyard cost {2} less to cast.
Whenever one or more opponents lose life, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Alisaie Leveilleur
card.oracle_text:
Partner with Alphinaud Leveilleur (When this creature enters, target player may put Alphinaud Leveilleur into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
First strike
Dualcast — The second spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast.

card.name: Dancer's Chakrams
Summon: Good King Mog XII
card.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)
I — Create two 1/2 white Moogle creature tokens with lifelink.
II, III — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell this turn, create a token that's a copy of a non-Saga token you control.
IV — Put two +1/+1 counters on each other Moogle you control.
Flying, lifelink

card.name: Tataru Taru
card.oracle_text:
When Tataru Taru enters, you draw a card and target opponent may draw a card.
Scions' Secretary — Whenever an opponent draws a card, if it isn't that player's turn, create a tapped Treasure token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Champions from Beyond
card.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, create X 1/1 colorless Hero creature tokens.
Light Party — Whenever you attack with four or more creatures, scry 2, then draw a card.
Full Party — Whenever you attack with eight or more creatures, those creatures get +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Thancred Waters
card.oracle_text:
Flash
Royal Guard — When Thancred Waters enters, another target legendary permanent you control gains indestructible for as long as you control Thancred Waters.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Thancred Waters gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Lingering Souls
card.oracle_text:
Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor_text: "Strange as it may seem, the longer I linger here, the less the matter of my epitaph concerns me."

card.name: Alphinaud Leveilleur
card.oracle_text:
Partner with Alisaie Leveilleur (When this creature enters, target player may put Alisaie Leveilleur into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
Vigilance
Eukrasia — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Archaeomancer's Map
card.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, search your library for up to two basic Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever a land an opponent controls enters, if that player controls more lands than you, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Hermes, Overseer of Elpis
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying and vigilance.
Whenever you attack with one or more Birds, scry 2.
card.flavor_text: "For us, there may be no higher purpose than to live for our world, but what of the other living beings out there?"

card.name: Hraesvelgr of the First Brood
card.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, ward {2}
Shiva's Aid — When Hraesvelgr enters and whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
card.flavor_text: "Never shall our grief be assuaged nor our loss forgotten."

card.name: Blue Mage's Cane
Authority of the Consuls
card.oracle_text:
Creatures your opponents control enter tapped.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls enters, you gain 1 life.
card.flavor_text:
"He must be guilty of something or other, or he wouldn't have attempted to flee the Empire."
—Yotsuyu goe Brutus

card.name: Cleansing Nova
card.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Destroy all artifacts and enchantments.
card.flavor_text:
"We called this calamity the 'Flood of Light.' Everything it touched was leeched of life and vigor, leaving naught behind but a luminous wasteland."
—Moren, Crystarium Librarian

card.name: Cut a Deal
card.oracle_text: Each opponent draws a card, then you draw a card for each opponent who drew a card this way.
card.flavor_text:
"A strong Eorzea will ever have need of
a strong Ul'dah."
—Nanamo Ul Namo

card.name: Observed Stasis
card.oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When this Aura enters, remove enchanted creature from combat. Then draw a card for each tapped creature its controller controls.
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and can't attack or block.

card.name: Final Judgment
card.oracle_text: Exile all creatures.
card.flavor_text:
"Let this be a lesson to all those who
would walk the path of sin—the wicked
shall not inherit this world!"
—Vauthry

card.name: Swords to Plowshares
card.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
card.flavor_text: "The refreshing caress of the wind, the soothing whisper of the waves... how liberating!"

card.name: Eye of Nidhogg
card.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a black Dragon with base power and toughness 4/2, has flying and deathtouch, and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
When Eye of Nidhogg is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fandaniel, Telophoroi Ascian
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, surveil 1.
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent may sacrifice a nontoken creature of their choice. Each opponent who doesn't loses 2 life for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.

card.name: Archmage Emeritus
card.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
card.flavor_text:
"If you are ever to become a capable
astrologian, you must believe in the path
laid out before you, and in your power to
read it, follow it, and ultimately control it."
—Leveva Heavensreader

card.name: Reaper's Scythe
card.oracle_text:
Job select
At the beginning of your end step, put a soul counter on this Equipment for each player who lost life this turn.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each soul counter on this Equipment and is an Assassin in addition to its other types.
Death Sickle — Equip {2}

card.name: Dig Through Time
card.oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Into the Story
card.oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if an opponent has seven or more cards in their graveyard.
Draw four cards.
card.flavor_text: "Hear... feel... think..."

card.name: Propaganda
card.oracle_text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
card.flavor_text:
"Barring a few exceptions, we have detained
all those with allegiance to the Scions. The
Rising Stones is also under our control."
—Crystal Brave Soldier

card.name: Transpose
card.oracle_text:
Draw a card, then discard a card. You lose 1 life. If this spell was cast from your hand, create a 0/1 black Wizard creature token with "Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this token deals 1 damage to each opponent."
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Rite of Replication
card.oracle_text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.
card.flavor_text: "Eorzea is mine by right!"

card.name: Sublime Epiphany
card.oracle_text:
Choose one or more —
• Counter target spell.
• Counter target activated or triggered ability.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
• Target player draws a card.

card.name: Torrential Gearhulk
card.oracle_text:
Flash
When this creature enters, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Bastion of Remembrance
card.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
card.flavor_text: The legacy of Gaius van Baelsar is a towering monument to imperial tyranny.

card.name: Circle of Power
card.oracle_text:
You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. Create a 0/1 black Wizard creature token with "Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this token deals 1 damage to each opponent."
Wizards you control get +1/+0 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Astrologian's Planisphere
Snuff Out
card.oracle_text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
card.flavor_text: "Look, Avere! All these people have come to make you a gift of their souls!"

card.name: Lethal Scheme
card.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Each creature that convoked this spell connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

card.name: Crux of Fate
card.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
card.flavor_text: "Thou art weak, Hraesvelgr—a slithering wyrm who fawneth on the vermin who should rightly be his prey."

card.name: Exsanguinate
card.oracle_text: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
card.flavor_text:
"As the fight wore on, blood began to soak through his armor, spreading to every ilm of his body. But when it began to rise and envelop him as a mist, I realized it wasn't blood, but something dark and twisted..."
—Ishgardian Citizen

card.name: Ardbert, Warrior of Darkness
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a white spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each legendary creature you control. They gain vigilance until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on each legendary creature you control. They gain menace until end of turn.
card.flavor_text: "Always we took the burden of fighting upon ourselves. That's what heroes do, isn't it?"

card.name: Estinien Varlineau
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Estinien Varlineau. It gains flying until end of turn.
At the beginning of your second main phase, you draw X cards and lose X life, where X is the number of your opponents who were dealt combat damage by Estinien Varlineau or a Dragon this turn.

card.name: Syphon Mind
card.oracle_text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
card.flavor_text:
"'Tis now all but certain that the towers
were conceived to facilitate the summoning
of primals by those imprisoned within."
—Urianger Augurelt

card.name: Krile Baldesion
card.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Trace Aether — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may return target creature card with mana value equal to that spell's mana value from your graveyard to your hand. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Papalymo Totolymo
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Papalymo Totolymo deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Papalymo Totolymo: Each opponent who lost life this turn sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control.

card.name: Urianger Augurelt
card.oracle_text:
Whenever you play a land from exile or cast a spell from exile, you gain 2 life.
Draw Arcanum — {T}: Look at the top card of your library. You may exile it face down.
Play Arcanum — {T}: Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled with Urianger Augurelt. Spells you cast this way cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Lyse Hext
card.oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
As long as you've cast two or more noncreature spells this turn, Lyse Hext has double strike.

card.name: Baleful Strix
card.oracle_text:
Flying, deathtouch
When this creature enters, draw a card.
card.flavor_text: Skatenes are mind-quickened owls, granted sentience via powerful magicks much in the same way toads are transformed into poroggos.

card.name: Vindicate
card.oracle_text: Destroy target permanent.
card.flavor_text: "Remember... remember us... remember... that we once lived..."

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text:
"I preside over the forces of stasis, tranquility, peace. I will weave this selfsame power into the crystal, granting thee mastery over matter, to give form to the formless."
—Hydaelyn

card.name: Void Rend
card.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy target nonland permanent.
card.flavor_text:
"I expect some voidsent are more intelligent than others. Perhaps these ones simply do not understand our words."
—Y'shtola Rhul

card.name: Sage's Nouliths
White Auracite
card.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this artifact leaves the battlefield.
{T}: Add {W}.
card.flavor_text: "She gave her life that we might defeat the Ascians. Her sacrifice must not be in vain."

card.name: Relic of Legends
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Tap an untapped legendary creature you control: Add one mana of any color.
card.flavor_text:
"A smile better suits a hero."
—Haurchefant Greystone

card.name: Sol Ring
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
card.flavor_text: It is said that aetheryte is the solid manifestation of the planet's lifeblood, aether, and that by touching it, the aether which makes up our bodies resonates with that contained in the crystal.

card.name: Thought Vessel
card.oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.
card.flavor_text: Initiating... Performing diagnostics... Diagnostics complete. To proceed, please agree to the terms and conditions of use.

card.name: Tome of Legends
card.oracle_text:
This artifact enters with a page counter on it.
Whenever your commander enters or attacks, put a page counter on this artifact.
{1}, {T}, Remove a page counter from this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Arcane Sanctum
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.
card.flavor_text:
"None of us were prepared for the spectacle that awaited us when we first stepped into the tower. To be surrounded by the marvels of a lost age took our breath away."
—Ironworks datalog 2.5

card.name: Ash Barrens
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
card.flavor_text: There's a legend that tells of an ancient battle between the esper Odin and a powerful magus... It took place in the great hall of a castle.

card.name: Coveted Jewel
card.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, draw three cards.
{T}: Add three mana of any one color.
Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of this artifact. Untap it.

card.name: Talisman of Hierarchy
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}. This artifact deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: "A red mage's spells belong to two distinct schools, rooted as they are in the ancient disciplines of black and white magic."

card.name: Talisman of Progress
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}. This artifact deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"Master Louisoix... I understand now... the choice you made... In death... there is life..."
—Moenbryda Wilfsunnwyn

card.name: Fetid Heath
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{W/B}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{B}, or {B}{B}.
card.flavor_text:
"Nowhere... to... run... Nowhere... to... hide... No escape... for... you..."
-—Ghosts on the Phantom Train

card.name: Demolition Field
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. That land's controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. You may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Command Tower
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text: To dizzying heights it rises, the gleaming spire, its tip threatening to pierce the blinding canopy. There it will all begin anew. Between Dark and Light, the pure and the corrupt—the one true struggle.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text:
"Both the Crusaders and the Al Bhed truly wish peace for Spira. This Operation Miʼhen was born from that wish they share."
—Seymour Guado

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"We have been expecting you, Lady Yuna. Welcome to Guadosalam."
—Tromell, Seymour's butler

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Talisman of Dominance
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}. This artifact deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"The Ascian used me, as he used so many others-all to further the restoration of his wretched god."
—Gaius Baelsar

card.name: Desolate Mire
card.flavor_text:
"To the south of here lies the Veldt. 'Tis a wild and dangerous land, inhabited by all manner of ferocious beasts..."
-—Cyan Garamonde

card.name: Isolated Chapel
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
card.flavor_text: This is the Sealed Gate... Beyond there is the esper world.

card.name: Scavenger Grounds
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all graveyards.
card.flavor_text: "The Burn"—-once a verdant region teeming with flora and fauna, repeated summonings saw it bled of aether and reduced to a barren desert.

card.name: Shineshadow Snarl
card.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Plains or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
card.flavor_text: Reports of bloody carnage have reached the Crystarium, and the guard has deployed in force in answer to Holminster's plea for aid.

card.name: Sunlit Marsh
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
This land enters tapped.
card.flavor_text:
"Ah, our guests have arrived!"
-—Aenc Thon, Lord of the Lingering Gaze

card.name: Temple of the False God
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only if you control five or more lands.
card.flavor_text:
"It is better for you to die in hope than to live in despair. Let me be your liberator."
—Lady Yunalesca

card.name: Drowned Catacomb
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
card.flavor_text:
"The maze that surrounds the base of the tower is known as the 'Labyrinth of the Ancients.'"
—G'raha Tia

card.name: Prairie Stream
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
card.flavor_text:
"Hydatos, a reference to its watery disposition. This will be the last corner of the island that the expedition will need to contend with."
—Eureka expedition ferryman

card.name: Sunken Hollow
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
This land enters tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
card.flavor_text: Haunting the depths of what is now Loch Seld, Skalla's silent walls lure adventurers into the salt-laden waters with the promise of mysteries unsolved and treasures unclaimed.

card.name: Sunken Ruins
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{U/B}, {T}: Add {U}{U}, {U}{B}, or {B}{B}.
card.flavor_text:
"Look closely. Emet-Selch has not simply reclaimed these ruins he has layered the semblance of an entire city upon them."
—Y'shtola Rhul

card.name: Glacial Fortress
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
card.flavor_text: For as long as their nation has warred with Dravania, there have been Ishgardians who instead chose to ally themselves with the dragons. Shiva is said to have been among the first, hence why the heretics revere her as a saint.

card.name: Underground River
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: For years, it was not known how the pirates were able to raid areas so far from the coast, until a local shepherd sighted a band of painted ruffians entering the Sastasha Seagrot...

card.name: Skycloud Expanse
card.flavor_text:
"Deep within the Sea of Clouds, beyond treacherous winds and swirling rock, lies a land like no other. Isles-—nay, pristine jewels—clustered about a massive floating crystal."
—Diadem mission commander

card.name: Port Town
card.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Plains or Island card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
card.flavor_text:
"The excitement here has reached a fever pitch as the opening ceremony gets under way!"
—Blitzball announcer

card.name: Idyllic Beachfront
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
This land enters tapped.
card.flavor_text:
"This is where I was born. I started blitz when I was five. I joined the Aurochs at thirteen... ten years ago. Ten years... and we never won a game."
—Wakka

card.name: Choked Estuary
card.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal an Island or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
card.flavor_text:
"The imperials have not gained any ground since our last battle, but neither have we."
—Ala Mhigan resistance fighter

card.name: Contaminated Aquifer
card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
This land enters tapped.
card.flavor_text:
"With Gunnhildr's Blades and the Warrior of Light leading the charge, it is only a matter of time before Castrum Lacus Litore is ours."
—Bajsaljen Ulgasch

card.name: Darkwater Catacombs
card.flavor_text: Thought to have been built by the Nymian civilization, which thrived in the area some fifteen centuries ago, the palace appears to have been dedicated to their patron deity, Oschon, the Wanderer.

card.name: Y'shtola, Night's Blessed
card.oracle_text:
Vigilance
At the beginning of each end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, you draw a card.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or greater, Y'shtola deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

tokens.name: Alisaie Leveilleur
tokens.oracle_text:
Partner with Alphinaud Leveilleur (When this creature enters, target player may put Alphinaud Leveilleur into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
First strike
Dualcast — The second spell you cast each turn costs {2} less to cast.
tokens.flavor_text: "No matter what happens, we have to survive. Together."

tokens.name: Alphinaud Leveilleur
tokens.oracle_text:
Partner with Alisaie Leveilleur (When this creature enters, target player may put Alisaie Leveilleur into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)
